definition: Kenting, a national park on the southern tip of Taiwan, popular as a tourist destination (abbr. for 墾丁國家公園|垦丁国家公园[Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2])
to reclaim (land)/to cultivate
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
surname Ding
Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

sentences.english: He goes scuba-diving at Kenting every summer.
sentences.chinese: 他每年暑假都到墾丁去潛水。

sentences.english: Emma: We can't take the public bus because we're still quite a distance from Kenting.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能搭公車，因爲到墾丁還很遠。

sentences.english: Kevin went snorkeling in Kenting to see the beautiful coral.
sentences.chinese: 凱文到墾丁浮潛，看到了美麗的珊瑚礁。

sentences.english: My wife and I decided to take a weekend trip to Kenting .
sentences.chinese: 我的妻子和我決定採取一個週末前往墾丁。

sentences.english: Yes, this is my whole family by the sea in Kenting.
sentences.chinese: 對，這是我們全家人在墾丁的海邊照的。

sentences.english: My family and I enjoyed ourselves in Kenting on our summer vacation .
sentences.chinese: 我和我的家人在墾丁很享受我們的假期。

sentences.english: You won't get a hotel room in Kenting.
sentences.chinese: 你在墾丁訂不到旅館房間的。

sentences.english: I recommend you go to Kenting or Fulong.
Can you tell me more about your trip to Kenting?
sentences.chinese: 可以多告訴我一些關於墾丁之旅的事嗎？

sentences.english: This spring vacation, I went with some of my classmates by bus to Kenting National Park.
sentences.chinese: 今年春假，我和一些同學搭巴士到墾丁國家公園。

sentences.english: I drew this when I were in Kenting.
Spring Scream is a musical extravaganza that is held annually in the Kending area.
sentences.chinese: 音樂盛典每年都會在墾丁舉行。

sentences.english: I slept at a hotel near the beach when I traveled in Kenting.
sentences.chinese: 當我在墾丁旅遊時，我住在海邊附近的旅館。

sentences.english: Millions of visitors, both domestic and from abroad, enjoy Kenting National Park every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有數百萬的本國和外國遊客訪遊墾丁國家公園。

sentences.english: Mike: "Well, that's because there isn't a train station in Kenting."
sentences.chinese: 欸，那是因爲沒有到墾丁的火車。

sentences.english: You can go to the beaches in Kenting.

definition: Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
Taidong or Taitung city and county in Taiwan
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
roundabout (traffic island)/around an island (trip etc)
coast/seaside/seashore/beach
Lanyu or Orchid Island township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Taroko gorge national park in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], Taiwan/Taroko ethnic group Taiwan
Hengchun town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
beach/sandy shore/CL:片[pian4]
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
urban district/downtown/city center
